# List of Zites

1. Services
2. Search Engines
3. Blogs
4. Media
5. Discussion
6. Politics
7. Chat
8. Porn

##  1. Services

[Nullpaste](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/) Pastebin for [[ZeroNet]]

[ZeroMail](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/) Email over ZeroNet

[ZeroProxies](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo/) Public ZeroNet proxies

[ZeroID](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroid.bit/) Decentralized user authentication

[ZeroVerse](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HPgDoReCFtE9qy71hnp55ksBVvV1gHJLQ) An alternative service to ZeroID

## 2. Search Engines

[Kaffiene](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/)

[ZeroSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit)

[Bwoi](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF/)

[CensoredSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/)

## 3. Blogs

[ZeroBlogs](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12WY4MGfJDjuBjj692q9x4TH8S5fsfaMtm/) Blog Lists

[ZeroNet Dev Blog](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit)

## 4. Media

[Play Torrents](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/)

[Microsoft MSDN Software](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG/) Uses Mega links

## 5. Discussion

[Zerotalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/) Similar to Reddit

[ZeroBoard](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Board.ZeroNetwork.bit/) Very basic microblogging

[0rc](http://127.0.0.1:43110/main.0rc.bit)  A WIP replacement for Slack/IRC

## 6. Politics

[CensoredSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/)

## 7. Chat

[ZeroChatIRC](http://127.0.0.1:43110/main.0rc.bit)

[ZeroMedia](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeromedia.bit/)

## 8. Porn

[0chan Porn](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NZNtZQZHQRJXafvJpmY5jgqwRaCEZMsUc/) Imageboard using optional files, users only download what they request

[PORN.0chan](http://127.0.0.1:43110/18y7YzbegRnUXMovnYtmFfndSpd1paEVRr/) Legal porn imageboard

[Pix Image Albums](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0pix.bit/) Trigger warning: non-nude jailbait section. Uses optional files

[Porn on 0Chan](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NZNtZQZHQRJXafvJpmY5jgqwRaCEZMsUc/) Features separate boards for the following categories: Random, Hardcore, Gay, Lesbian, Hentai, Futanari, Unpopular.

# Welcome to ZeroWiki

Welcome to ZeroWiki, a new kind of **publishing platform for ZeroNet**, the distributed web we all love.

ZeroWiki is a public [[wiki]] software and most of the pages in this site are editable, anyone can modify it to add or improve the contents. See the [help page](http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Help) to learn how it works.

Wikis can be used for taking notes and storing snippets, to create [[FAQ]]s and documentation, to keep track of your goals or as a simple To-Do list. As it happens with most collaborative tools, it can be used in many different ways, even to build your own community.

Use it however you want, ZeroWiki is free and [[cloneable]] from your [[ZeroNet]] connected sites.

## Testing

For testing please use the [[ZeroWiki:Sandbox]].

## ZeroWiki is beta software

This project is still in beta phase and it may have bugs or lack features.

Please report bugs and add feature requests to the [[ZeroWiki:Issues]] page.

## Discuss ZeroWiki
[Discussion this Wiki engine on ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:5_1LRrd96P7FiTcsyNXVzPM5jtpQoH1B4gYf/ZeroWiki+a+wiki+for+ZeroNet) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:5_1LRrd96P7FiTcsyNXVzPM5jtpQoH1B4gYf/ZeroWiki+a+wiki+for+ZeroNet)

# ZeroPolls

A [[zite]] where you can vote and comment on polls. It's also possible to create new polls. Your votes are just [[pseudonymity|pseudonymous]], not [[anonymity|anonymous]].

## See also

* [[ZeroTodos]]
* [[ZeroQuotes]]


## External links

* [Official zite](/ZeroPolls.bit) [ðŸ“Ž](/1K28kQFMquNzto2iQf4GGjr6oFUbC1NddE)
* [on 0list](/0list.bit/?Topic:1_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD/ZeroPolls) [ðŸ“Ž](/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o/?Topic:1_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD/ZeroPolls)
* [developer blog (Ekaterina)](/1Kp5xdjQyrPth5mEJsn6NDBKZxcaeYz86N/)

# 0list

0list is a [[site index]], where everybody can post, rate and comment on [[zite]]s.

## See also

* [[search engine]]

## External links
* [Official zite](/0list.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o)

# content.json

This file lists all files a [[zite]] contains, furthermore it contains a signature so that only you and whoever you give permission can update the content of your zite.

## External links

* [ZeroNet Docs](/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe/site_development/content_json/)

# MarkDown

MarkDown is a lightweight markup language for formatting plain text in an easy and intuitive way. It's looks similar to â€˜formattingâ€™ conventions which were already in use for plain text e-mail and chat.

## Example

    Heading (1st level)
    ===
    
    Sub-heading (2nd level)
    ---
    
    ### Sub-sub-heading (3rd level, alternative notation)
    
    Just some text purely 
    for demonstration purpose.
    
    We can also make text
    /italic/, **bold** or ___both___
    
    > It actually depends amount of used symbols
    but it does not matter if it is /, * or _
    
    we can also have lists
    * and `code`
    + [links](/0list.bit) [ðŸ“Ž](/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o)
    - as well as horizontal rules
    
    ---
    1. numbered
    2. lists work
    3. as well

*results in* [[MarkDown (Preview)]]

## External links

* [official website](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/)
* [wikipedia entry](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown)

(see [[MarkDown]] for explanation)

Heading (1st level)
===

Sub-heading (2nd level)
---

### Sub-sub-heading (3rd level, alternative notation)

Just some text purely 
for demonstration purpose.

We can also make text
/italic/, **bold** or ___both___

> It actually depends amount of used symbols
but it does not matter if it is /, * or _

we can also have lists
* and `code`
+ [links](/0list.bit) [ðŸ“Ž](/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o)
- as well as horizontal rules

---
1. numbered
2. lists work
3. as well

(see [[MarkDown]] for expaination)

Heading (1st level)
===

Sub-heading (2nd level)
---

### Sub-sub-heading (3rd level, alternative notation)

Just some text purely 
for demonstration purpose.

We can also make text
/italic/, **bold** or ___both___

> It actually depends amount of used symbols
but it does not matter if it is /, * or _

we can also have lists
* and `code`
+ [links](/0list.bit) [ðŸ“Ž](/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o)
- as well as horizontal rules

# ZeroWiki Issues

## Bugs
+ Don't work with special chars in page name (example - try to create page with _ char)

Please report bugs in this section.

## Feature Requests

Please add feature requests here.
+ Localization for pages (example - we have [[Help]] page with default language (en) but if we add ?lang=$name you can get localized version)
+ upload content (images) but only as optional files
+  interface localization 
+ if 2 people editing page at the same time - show alert
+ Global 'recent changes' page
+ highlight difference between version when open history (like github)
+ protected pages
+ moderators
* creative commons license for easier (legal) modification of articles
+ anchor to elements
+ code element
* seperate ZeroWiki: sites from normal sites
* support [ [wikisite|alternative naming] ]

----

### To Link Is To Do

There's a problem with ZeroNet links because the host part http://host:port differs a lot from client to client and especially for proxies:

Try a link via 127.0.0.1:43110 using a proxy or with a different port number in your local setup... it'll fail...

* [Official zite](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba)

```
* [Official zite](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba)
```

Link without HOST part works with proxies too:

* [Official zite](/search.kaffie.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](/1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba)

```
* [Official zite](/search.kaffie.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](/1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba)
```

...seen something like that @ Himalaya...

...byeÂ² from Alfie...

-> but there is afaik an addon, that makes urls like http://search.kaffie.bit usable â€¦ that would probably break it, not sure so. But agree, relative paths would be better.

----

# Welcome to ZeroWiki

Welcome to ZeroWiki, a new kind of **publishing platform for ZeroNet**, the distributed web we all love.

ZeroWiki is a public [[wiki]] software and most of the pages in this site are editable, anyone can modify it to add or improve the contents. See the [help page](http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Help) to learn how it works.

Wikis can be used for taking notes and storing snippets, to create FAQs and documentation, to keep track of your goals or as a simple To-Do list. As it happens with most collaborative tools, it can be used in many different ways, even to build your own community.

Use it however you want, ZeroWiki is free and cloneable from your [[ZeroNet]] connected sites.

## Testing

For testing please use the [[ZeroWiki:Sandbox]].

## ZeroWiki is beta software

This project is still in beta fase and it may have bugs or lack features.

Please report bugs and add feature requests to the [[ZeroWiki:Issues]] page.

## Discuss ZeroWiki
[Discussion this Wiki engine on ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:5_1LRrd96P7FiTcsyNXVzPM5jtpQoH1B4gYf/ZeroWiki+a+wiki+for+ZeroNet) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:5_1LRrd96P7FiTcsyNXVzPM5jtpQoH1B4gYf/ZeroWiki+a+wiki+for+ZeroNet)

# ZeroSearch

ZeroSearch is the first [[search engine]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite]]s. It uses naive queries to search through a plain-text index of sites along with hand-picked tags. There are currently over 400 sites listed in the index.



## See also

* [[bwoi]]
* [[Kaffiene]]
* [[Zearch]]


## External links

* [Official zite](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ZeroeuDnL2jNS6t1epQa1SPvC91KG8ER)
* [on 0list](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:2_19oqmmxwEN4mBrKAevRx5WiQKtkX8zGsbi/ZeroSearch) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o/?Topic:2_19oqmmxwEN4mBrKAevRx5WiQKtkX8zGsbi/ZeroSearch)

# Kaffiene

Kaffiene is a [[search engine]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite]]s. It uses naive and [[regex]] queries to search through a plain-text index of sites along with hand-picked tags. The site freely shares it's index and has enabled cloning. There are currently over 300 sites listed in the index.



## See also

* [[bwoi]]
* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Zearch]]


## External links

* [Official zite](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba)
* [on 0list](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_19oqmmxwEN4mBrKAevRx5WiQKtkX8zGsbi/Kaffiene+Search) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o/?Topic:1_19oqmmxwEN4mBrKAevRx5WiQKtkX8zGsbi/Kaffiene+Search)
* [developer blog (Kaffie)](http://127.0.0.1:43110/kaffie.bit/) [ðŸ“Ž](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1N6zp6jCXPBktNMPfe7UJBpQGyfCq7k2M8)

# ZeroPolls

A [[zite]] where you can vote and comment on polls. It's also possible to create new polls. Your votes are just [[pseudonymity|pseudonymous]], not [[anonymity|anonymous]].

## See also

* [[ZeroTodos]]
* [[ZeroQuotes]]

# Welcome to ZeroWiki

Welcome to ZeroWiki, a new kind of **publishing platform for ZeroNet**, the distributed web we all love.

ZeroWiki is a public [[wiki]] software and most of the pages in this site are editable, anyone can modify it to add or improve the contents. See the [help page](http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Help) to learn how it works.

Wikis can be used for taking notes and storing snippets, to create FAQs and documentation, to keep track of your goals or as a simple To-Do list. As it happens with most collaborative tools, it can be used in many different ways, even to build your own community.

Use it however you want, ZeroWiki is free and cloneable from your [[ZeroNet]] connected sites.

## Testing

For testing please use the [[ZeroWiki:Sandbox]].

## ZeroWiki is beta software

This project is still in beta fase and it may have bugs or lack features.

# Welcome to ZeroWiki

Welcome to ZeroWiki, a new kind of **publishing platform for ZeroNet**, the distributed web we all love.

ZeroWiki is a public [[wiki]] software and most of the pages in this site are editable, anyone can modify it to add or improve the contents. See the [help page](http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Help) to learn how it works.

Wikis can be used for taking notes and storing snippets, to create FAQs and documentation, to keep track of your goals or as a simple To-Do list. As it happens with most collaborative tools, it can be used in many different ways, even to build your own community.

Use it however you want, ZeroWiki is free and cloneable from your [[ZeroNet]] connected sites.

## ZeroWiki is beta software

This project is still in beta fase and it may have bugs or lack features.

# Search Engine

A site used to search through the hundreds of [[ZeroNet]] sites and find relevant content. There are a few main search engines for ZeroNet. The most popular is [[Kaffiene]]. Other popular sites include [[ZeroSearch]] and [[Bwoi]]. All three search through a plain text index of sites. [[Zearch]] uses a more traditional approach of categorizing and searching content.

## See also

* [[site index]]

# Kaffiene

Kaffiene is a [[search engine]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite]]s. It uses naive and [[regex]] queries to search through a plain-text index of sites along with hand-picked tags. The site freely shares it's index and has enabled cloning. There are currently over 300 sites listed in the index.



## See also

* [[bwoi]]
* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Zearch]]
